en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 30% for each Resistance-Skill Bind awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: みんなでゲームがしたいよ
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内の封印耐性の覚醒数に応じて 攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: I wanna play with everybody!
kr_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Resistance-Skill Bind] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns

na_skill.name: I wanna play with everybody!
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Resistance-Skill Bind] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns
